head.title: Emergency Notification - Mason City Schools

meta.content:
On Wed., March 21, 2018 all Mason City Schools are on a 2-Hour Delay due to the snow. (Happy 2nd day of Spring in SW OH!)
AM Kindergarten & AM Preschool begin at 11:10 am, dismiss at 12:55 pm. PM Kindergarten & PM Preschool begin at 1:55 pm, dismiss at 3:40 pm.
Today's MHS Primetime is going on as scheduled.
Kindergarten Registration Packet Return will go on as scheduled for 6:00-8:00 p.m. in the MECC Gymnasium on Wednesday, March 21st.

div.p: In accordance with Governor DeWine's announcement on April 20, 2020, all Mason City School buildings and facilities will continue to be closed for the remainder of the school year. Our teachers and staff will continue to serve our students and families through Remote Learning Experience as we finish the year strong together. For more information and updates, please visit our COVID-19 Headquarters at mcscovid19.com
